document.full_text: apple inc has sued rival samsung electronics claiming that the south korean firm's galaxy line of mobile phones and tablets "slavishly" copies the iphone and ipad, according to court papers.
document.title: apple sues samsung over galaxy phones, tablets
lines_and_colors: apple inc has sued rival samsung electronics claiming that the south korean firm's galaxy line of mobile phones and tablets "slavishly" copies the iphone and ipad, according to court papers.
